charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking around
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] caught a whiff of an appetizing
aroma.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1101_0200:
As [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] traced the scent to its origin, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found
Ortega.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_0400: You smell so good, as always!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_0700:
Wh-what’re you doing here? You need something
or what?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_0900: Dachsbun’s aroma brought you here, didn’t it.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1000:
It’s written all over your face. You’re so
predictable.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1100: If you’re so obsessed with the smell...
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1200:
Why not have Dachsbun help you grow,
like they do with wheat?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1700:
Dachsbun’s pleasant aroma helps wheat grow,
so they’ve been treasured by farming villages.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1800:
All I’m saying is if you need to grow,
Dachsbun could help!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_1900:
Eh, whatever. Anyway, Dachsbun smells REALLY
good, doesn’t he?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_2000:
I can’t get enough of his aroma, so I keep sniffing
the little guy.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_2100: Plus he’s cute and strong in battle. He’s the best!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_0402_2600: Huh?! Don’t treat me like a kid! What the HECK!!!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_2700:
Just so you know, I’m in a higher grade than
Juliana and Florian!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_2800: So you better show some respect! Got it?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_2900: *sigh* Do you really get it? Eh, whatever.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_3000: All that sniffing Dachsbun made me hungry.
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_3100:
Are you hungry, too? Wanna grab something
to eat?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_0401_3300: All right! Let’s stop by the bakery, then!
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_0302_3400: What do you want to eat?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_0402_3500: Huh? Bread, of course! What else?
charaepi_ch0329_00_ortiga/2301_1201_3600: Come on! Don’t just stand there. Let’s go already!
